===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to [[evacuate]]

====Usage notes====
When referring to evacuating people, [[疏散]] (shūsàn) is used. When referring to evacuating from a place, 撤離 (chèlí) is used. The term [[後送]] (hòusòng) is restricted to military contexts.

[[zh-min-nan:撤離]]
